edu.northwestern.at.utils.spellcheck
Class TernaryTrieSpellingDictionary

java.lang.Object
  edu.northwestern.at.utils.spellcheck.TernaryTrieSpellingDictionary
All Implemented Interfaces:
SpellingDictionary
public class TernaryTrieSpellingDictionary
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpellingDictionary

TernaryTrieSpellingDictionary -- implements spelling dictionary using ternary trie.

This class provides the basic methods for a spelling checker dictionary implemented using a ternary trie.

          Debugging flag.

Method Detail

lookupWord

public boolean lookupWord(java.lang.String word)
Lookup word in dictionary.

Specified by:
lookupWord in interface SpellingDictionary
Parameters:
word - The word to lookup.
Returns:
True if the word was found in the dictionary.

Note:

Any processing of the word (conversion to lower case, etc.) should be done before calling this routine.
